meanings.definition: A group of performers, especially actors, singers, or dancers, who work together as a team.
meanings.sent1: The troupes of actors rehearsed their play together.
meanings.sent2: The troupes of dancers performed beautifully on stage.
meanings.sent3: The troupes of singers harmonized perfectly during the concert.
meanings.sent4: The troupes of actors painted vivid stories with their performances.
meanings.sent5: The troupes of dancers moved in perfect synchronization, mesmerizing the audience.

meanings.definition: To gather or move in a group or as a group.
meanings.sent1: Birds troupes together during migration for safety.
meanings.sent2: People troupes around the campfire to stay warm.
meanings.sent3: The ants troupes towards the food source in an organized line.
meanings.sent4: Clouds troupes across the sky, blocking the sun momentarily.
meanings.sent5: Students troupes into the classroom eagerly, ready to learn.
